message:
SYSTEM: OWL.pdf: Página 34
Transitive Properties
If a property is transitive, and the property relates individual a to
individual b, and also individual b to individual c, then we can infer
that individual a is related to individual c via the property.
hasAncestor is transitive
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
67
OWL and SWRL
Symmetric Properties
If a property is symmetric, and the property relates individual a to
individual b then individual b is also related to individual a via the
property.
hasSibling is symmetric
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
68
OWL and SWRL
